text: My two kids have been learning piano from teacher CW and absolutely love the lessons! She is patient, encouraging and makes learning fun while ensuring strong fundamentals. Their progress has been amazing and they always look forward to class. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a dedicated and skilled piano teacher!

My daughter has been learning piano with Miss Lee for 10 months now and she has made remarkable progress, including being able to sight-read and play several songs independently. My daughter genuinely enjoys her lessons with Miss Lee as she is patient, an experienced teacher who gives her constant encouragement and motivation, bringing joy of learning which allows my daughter to thrive.

The best part of CW teacher piano class it’s not just about an individual learning piano. She organises get together amongst students for piano recital to foster passion and further learning. Thumbs up!

We’re so grateful to have found Ms. CW for our energetic 6-year-old! She blends patience, expertise, and creativity, making piano lessons both fun and engaging. Her structured approach keeps him motivated, and he’s made steady progress while developing a true love for music. Ms. CW is more than a teacher—she’s a wonderful mentor who makes learning a joy!

I have been taking piano lessons with Cheng Wei for 5 months as an adult learner. Having no musical background, I knew that having an experienced, patient teacher who could flex according to my learning pace was critical.

Cheng Wei is a wonderful teacher. She makes sure that I first master the fundamentals (e.g. scales) and has also provided me with very clear advice on form and technique. This has allowed me to develop a strong base which has accelerated my pace of learning. Very important as a working adult with sometimes limited practice time.

Also, she is highly experienced and her lessons are always tailored to my ability and ambitions. Already targeting several key learning milestones next year!
